Name: Fall Rot
Text: German bombing of Wielun, Poland, part of Fall Weiss

Name: Fall Weiss
Text: German invasion of Poland

Name: Operation A-Bewegung
Text: German preparation for the invasion of Poland, part of Fall Weiss

Name: Operation Dirschau
Text: German operation to safeguard the rail bridge at Tczew, Poland during the invasion

Name: Operation Himmler
Text: German staged attacks in Poland to justify invasion, part of Fall Weiss

Name: Operation Ost
Text: German operation in Southern Poland near the border with Czechoslovakia

Name: Operation Sonderaktion Krakau
Text: German operation to murder members of the intelligentsia at univerisites in Krakow, Poland

Name: Operation Tannenberg
Text: German plan to exterminate Polish intelligentsia

Name: Operation Wasserkante
Text: German aerial bombing of Warsaw, Poland

Name: Operation Peking
Text: Polish naval withdraw to Britain prior to German invasion

Name: Operation Worek
Text: Polish naval defense of the Polish coast

Name: Operation Aida
Text: Axis attacks in Egypt and Libya with aim on Tobruk, Lybia

Name: Operation Dragoon
Text: Allied invasion of Southern France; original name was Operation Anvil

Name: Operation Overlord
Text: Allied invasion of Normandy, France

Name: Operation Avalanche
Text: Allied landing at Salerno, Italy

Name: Operation Rheinuebung
Text: The planned German attacks on Allied shipping conducted by Bismarck and Prinz Eugen

Name: Operation Sledgehammer
Text: Planned Allied invasion of Cherbourg or Brest, France; part of Operation Roundup

Name: Operation Market Garden
Text: Failed Allied attempt to secure bridges over the main rivers of Netherlands

Name: Operation Roundup
Text: Planned Allied invasion of Europe

Name: Operation Watchtower
Text: American invasion of Guadalcanal, Solomon Islands

Name: Operation Torch
Text: Allied invasion of French Morocco and Algeria
